trans-unit.source: Provides a base implementation of a channel object that exposes a dictionary interface to its properties.
trans-unit.target: 提供公开其属性的字典接口的通道对象的基实现。

trans-unit.source: BaseChannelObjectWithProperties is the base class for <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelSinkWithProperties>.
trans-unit.target: BaseChannelObjectWithProperties 是<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties><xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelSinkWithProperties>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelSinkWithProperties></xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties>的基类

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelSinkWithProperties> can be used as the base classes for channels and channel sinks that provide named properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties>和<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelSinkWithProperties>可以用作基类，这些类通道和通道接收器提供名为属性。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelSinkWithProperties></xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties>

trans-unit.source: BaseChannelObjectWithProperties handles the complex task of asking a channel object for its properties.
trans-unit.target: BaseChannelObjectWithProperties 处理要求通道对象的属性的复杂任务。

trans-unit.source: This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level.
trans-unit.target: 此类，使链接要求，并且在类级别继承要求。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>直接调用方或派生的类没有基础结构权限时，将引发。</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[的继承需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 引发一种<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: This method must not be implemented because it does not apply to the way <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> is being used in this case, and because <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 必须未实现此方法，因为它不适用于的方式<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>在这种情况下，使用和因为<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A>返回`true`。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The key that is associated with the object in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 与中的对象相关联的密钥`value`参数。

trans-unit.source: The value to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的值。

trans-unit.source: The method is called.
trans-unit.target: 调用该方法。

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 引发一种<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: This method must not be implemented because it does not apply to the way <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> is being used in this case, and because <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 必须未实现此方法，因为它不适用于的方式<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>在这种情况下，使用和因为<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A>返回`true`。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The method is called.
trans-unit.target: 调用该方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the channel object contains a property that is associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示通道对象是否包含与指定键关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: The key of the property to look for.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的属性的键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the channel object contains a property associated with the specified key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果通道对象包含与指定的键; 关联的属性否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 引发一种<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The array to copy the properties to.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到的属性的数组。

trans-unit.source: The index at which to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: 从此处开始复制索引。

trans-unit.source: The method is called.
trans-unit.target: 调用该方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of properties associated with the channel object.
trans-unit.target: 获取与通道对象相关联的属性的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of properties associated with the channel object.
trans-unit.target: 与通道对象相关联的属性的数目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator> that enumerates over all the properties associated with the channel object.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>，它枚举与通道对象相关联的所有属性。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator> that enumerates over all the properties associated with the channel object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>，它枚举与通道对象相关联的所有属性。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the number of properties that can be entered into the channel object is fixed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否具有固定可以进入通道对象的属性的数目。

trans-unit.source: The current implementation of IsFixedSize always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当前实现 IsFixedSize 始终返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the number of properties that can be entered into the channel object is fixed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果固定的可以进入通道对象的属性的数量;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection of properties in the channel object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示通道对象中属性的集合是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The current implementation of IsReadOnly always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当前实现 IsReadOnly 始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection of properties in the channel object is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果通道对象中属性的集合是只读的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the dictionary of channel object properties is synchronized.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步通道对象属性的字典。

trans-unit.source: The current implementation of IsSynchronized always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当前实现 IsSynchronized 始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the dictionary of channel object properties is synchronized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果同步的通道对象属性的字典;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the property that is associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取或设置与指定键关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: The key of the property to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 要获取或设置的属性的键。

trans-unit.source: The property that is associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 与指定键关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: The property is accessed.
trans-unit.target: 访问此属性。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of keys that the channel object properties are associated with.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>的与之关联的通道对象属性的密钥。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of keys that the channel object properties are associated with.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>的与之关联的通道对象属性的密钥。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the channel properties associated with the channel object.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>与通道对象相关联的通道属性。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Channels properties are used to configure the channel at run time.
trans-unit.target: 通道属性用于在运行时配置通道。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the channel properties associated with the channel object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>与通道对象相关联的通道属性。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 引发一种<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: This method must not be implemented because it does not apply to the way <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> is being used in this case, and because <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 必须未实现此方法，因为它不适用于的方式<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>在这种情况下，使用和因为<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A>返回`true`。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The key of the object to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的对象的键。

trans-unit.source: The method is called.
trans-unit.target: 调用该方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that is used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于对访问进行同步的对象<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The current implementation of SyncRoot returns a reference to the current instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties>.
trans-unit.target: SyncRoot 的当前实现将返回对<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties>的当前实例的引用

trans-unit.source: An object that is used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 用于对访问进行同步的对象<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that enumerates over all the properties that are associated with the channel object.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>，它枚举与通道对象相关联的所有属性。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that enumerates over all the properties that are associated with the channel object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>，它枚举与通道对象相关联的所有属性。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of the values of the properties associated with the channel object.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>与通道对象关联的属性的值。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of the values of the properties associated with the channel object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>与通道对象关联的属性的值。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>
